knimeNode.name: Noise Reduction
knimeNode.shortDescription: Removes random noise from MS data cells.

fullDescription.intro: Removes random noise in scans based on a minimum number of successive scans for a m/z trace. For every data point in a scan, adjacent scans within the specified time window are checked for data points within the mass tolerance. Only data points that are represented in adjacent scans are kept.
fullDescription.option: A minimum acceptable length of m/z traces, measured in consecutive scans where the m/z signals are present.

ports.outPort: Table containing noise reduced MS data cells.
